channel.title: Upload CSV to a Redshift / RDBMS Database
channel.description: Is there a way for users to upload CSV to a Redshift Database via Redash ? This would be really helpful if ReDash can be used to append external data to the DB.

item.title: Upload CSV to a Redshift / RDBMS Database
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Not supported right now as Redash is used exclusively for SELECT queries. Interested to see how much support there is for this one.

Read full topic
item.source: Upload CSV to a Redshift / RDBMS Database
